2.caption_en:
A circular "ecosystem" diagram centered on a human need, with concentric rings dividing core and complementary areas, labeled sectors (Needs, Enablers, Realizers, Orchestrators), and five orange numbered nodes positioned in the left quadrant. The visual uses teal rings and accents with gray sector lines and small instructional text near the center and lower-left.

{
  "artifact_type": "diagram",
  "title": "Ecosystem Mapping Wheel",
  "layout": {
    "shape": "concentric_circle",
    "center_coordinates": [0.5, 0.5],
    "rings": 4,
    "radial_sectors": 8
  },
  "colors": {
    "background": "white",
    "teal_accent": "teal/cyan",
    "outer_ring_teal": "teal/cyan",
    "sector_lines": "light_gray",
    "orange_nodes": "orange",
    "text": "dark_gray"
  },
  "center": {
    "label": "HUMAN",
    "number": 1,
    "position": [0.5, 0.5],
    "visual": "white circle inside teal ring"
  },
  "ring_labels": [
    {
      "ring": "outer",
      "label": "CORE AREAS",
      "position_description": "along upper-left outer arc"
    },
    {
      "ring": "outer",
      "label": "COMPLEMENTARY AREAS",
      "position_description": "along lower-right outer arc"
    }
  ],
  "sectors": [
    {"name": "NEEDS", "approx_center_angle_deg": 260, "adjacent_to_center": true},
    {"name": "ENABLERS", "approx_center_angle_deg": 220},
    {"name": "REALIZERS", "approx_center_angle_deg": 200},
    {"name": "ORCHESTRATORS", "approx_center_angle_deg": 240}
  ],
  "nodes": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "number": 1,
      "color": "orange",
      "position": [0.5, 0.5],
      "size_relative": 0.06,
      "description": "central human node"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "number": 2,
      "color": "orange",
      "position": [0.12, 0.15],
      "size_relative": 0.06,
      "description": "outer-left on core area ring"
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "number": 3,
      "color": "orange",
      "position": [0.24, 0.26],
      "size_relative": 0.07,
      "description": "inner-to-outer left quadrant"
    },
    {
      "id": 4,
      "number": 4,
      "color": "orange",
      "position": [0.17, 0.41],
      "size_relative": 0.07,
      "description": "mid-left quadrant node"
    },
    {
      "id": 5,
      "number": 5,
      "color": "orange",
      "position": [0.17, 0.60],
      "size_relative": 0.07,
      "description": "lower-left quadrant node"
    }
  ],
  "annotations": {
    "center_small_text": "What is the primary need of the human in this ecosystem segment?",
    "sector_prompts": "What is your own platform? Who are the other key players in this segment?",
    "bottom_left_list_title": "EXAMPLES OF ECOSYSTEMS",
    "bottom_left_examples": [
      "Health",
      "Recreation",
      "Education",
      "Work",
      "Entertainment",
      "Socialization",
      "Living",
      "Mobility",
      "Spirituality",
      "Shopping",
      "Food"
    ]
  },
  "image_size_px": [768, 768],
  "notes": "Positions are approximate normalized coordinates (0..1) with (0,0) top-left and (1,1) bottom-right; colors are described qualitatively." 
}
